Question: Midbar Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Midbar Co., Ltd.

AirFarm

- Inflatable farm enabling food production anytime, anywhere
- Converts moisture from the air into water in real-time
- Reduces water requirements by 99% versus traditional farming
- Sets up in just half a day, ideal for disaster-stricken areas and refugee camps
- Deflatable design for space food security
- Recognized as CES 2024 Best of Innovation Honoree in the Human Security for All category
Summary_cn:
Midbar Co., Ltd.

AirFarm

- 充气农场，可随时随地进行食品生产
- 实时将空气中的水分转化为水
- 与传统农业相比，水需求减少了99%
- 只需半天时间就能设置，非常适合受灾地区和难民营
- 可放气设计，用于保障太空食品安全
- 获得CES 2024年度创新荣誉奖，人人安全类别获奖者
